goal.en: The purpose of this course is to enhance the French beginners’ skills for reading and abilities of comprehension, and to give them basic elements of grammar.
goal.ch: 本課程的宗旨在於增進初學者的法文字彙，提昇其理解與分析能力，加強基本的文法觀念。

content.en: In addition to a basic French textbook, we will also read a wide range of beginner-level texts, including poems, fables, fairy tales, proverbs, jokes, letters, news, advertisements, etc. We strive to clarify difficult words, sentences and grammar rules and to explain the main features of these different types of literary and non-literary texts.
content.ch:
除了有一固定的基礎法文教本之外，另外廣泛閱讀各類型(文學與非文學)的作品。大致涵蓋詩歌、寓言、童話、童謠、漫畫、格言、諺語、笑話、謎語、日記、書信、遊記、新聞時事、體育報導、分類廣告、觀光導覽等不同類別。
課程進行一方面解釋文意，釐清艱深字句、文法；另一方面扼要地說明各種類型之主要特徵。

textbook.en: 1.APOLLINAIRE Guillaume, Calligrammes. 2.BAUDELAIRE Charles, Le Spleen de Paris. 3.BRASSENS Georges, Poemes et chansons. 4.COLUCHE, Et vous trouvez ca drole ? 5.HERGE, Les Aventures de Tintin, volume 5 : Le Lotus bleu. 6.IONESCO Eugene, La Lecon. 7.LA FONTAINE Jean de, Fables. 8.PEREC Georges, Je me souviens. 9.PEREC Georges, Nouveaux jeux interessants. 10.PREVERT Jacques, Paroles. 11.RENARD Jules, Histoires naturelles. 12.SAINT-EXUPERY Antoine de, Lettres a sa mere. 13.SOLLERS Philippe, L‘Annee du Tigre. 14.TISSERON Serge, Journal d‘un psychanalyste.
